text: Pai Thailand Vlog, New Discoveries Day
its a new day
always on the look out for something different
we are at the village farm
which is meant to be the most beautiful english flower garden in pai
its brand new so lets have a look
see whats there
complimentary umbrella
sacha is looking very posh with her umbrella
keeping her away from the sun
were just exploring the flower garden
at this new place
so from what i can see so far, you pay 60 baht per adult
grab yourself an umbrella
and then do a little self guided walk around the flower garden which is rather pretty
and then i assume animals will come later
sacha is entering the rabbit hut
have to keep the gate closed or they will escape
some good rabbit action
very soft
rabbit fans beware, they do look rather cute, when their eating,you may want to snatch one
these two look rather hot, chilling out next to the water station
some sleepies in there
now im off to the alpaca barn
sacha says you cant touch their heads becuse they are sensitive
its what the sign says
oh yeah
so this is tabu and rosemary
hello tabu and rosemary
you just keep chillin boys and girls
theyve got all their little names
these ones are for sale, it says we have nice bunny rabbit for sale
youre cuties
my brother used to have a rabbit, called charlotte, then we realised about a year later that it was actually a boy
nice idea, look at the view
it is a nice view yeah, you can see the buddha in the distance up there
its pretty cool
think i might join sach under that shade
theres a breeze
all we need now is for somebody to bring us a scone and cream tea
and well feel like we were in a real english garden setting
apart from the thai mountains nearby and the tropical plants
and the weather
this is a nice english garden thing, both my grandparents had these in their garden
ok i think were done here
head off to the next place
time for some mexican food
this is a pretty cool place
cafe cito mexican restaurant and coffee roaster
just got some mexican food, havent had mexican food for a long time
quite a cool little set up
this area is quite cool little find
its behind the police station
and it feels much quieter than the main street
theyve got a little fruit factory there that sells icecream by the scoop
homemade
no fruit though
no, no fruit
its nice, its worth having a look around, new discovery
weve come back to the resort where we are staying
going to have a nice ice coffee or an ice tea looking out at the view
its quite peaceful place to sit, we like it here
and its pet friendly
it is our last evening in pai until we head on to the next destination
so its food time now, and then night market, and then bed
so we can head out for our next journey
there are quite a few nice hotels and bars on the riverside as well
weve stayed in one before, the first time we came here which was nice
walk eden down by the river
enough exploring, lets go to the bistro
get food and then carrot cake
al pesto pizza has been ordered
and just in the background there, you can see cakes
get one of those later
carrot cake
gone for a health juice
beetroot carrot and ginger
actual mango pieces
cant go wrong with actual mango pieces
morning
its our last morning in pai today
js just done some car maintenance for the next leg of the journey
going to start packing up the car and then were going to head to town and get some breakfast before we check out
a lot of people will say, they like pai but they dont know why
and i think ive finally worked it out
this is probably the only place in north thailand that actually has a beach town feel
its quite a unique feeling
to have that in north thailand
with the mountains around
but also have a beach town feel
its cool
pai is one of those places, where on paper me and sacha shouldnt like it
because of the fact that it is so touristy
but because of that whole beachy town feel i think that is pretty much the reason why
it feels so nice
to come here and just chill out and relax
definitely come here out of high season because it is crazy busy, crazy busy, if you come here in november december
the place that i wanted to go to this morning was shut
so were trying out the witching well
which looks really nice
nice nusic
a healthy juice for sacha
beetroot carrot and apple
ok weve just had our last meal, weve seen that place many times and havent eaten there
so we figured wed give it a go
it was nice, had some good food and i liked the music
id go back
would you go back
i would yes
and were off on the next drive
bye bye pai
one of our subscribers asked us to give an opinion on driving in thailand
to be honest i think people worry more than they need to
i found the whole time weve been driving here for 3 years in an old car
that people drive a lot slower, theres less road rage
road conditions arnt that bad
theres potholes obviously
and in rural areas you might have to keep an eye out
people have all got varing opinions on what its like to drive here but in my honest opinion
its not that bad, actually ive driven in a lot worse places
i think its pretty good
i wouldnt say it was hard to drive in thailand
another new discovery on our little road trip
we are heading to mae hong son, the actual town of mae hong son
for our second destination
stopping off at this new place on the way
1864 coffee
its called 1864 coffee because there are 1,864turns between chiang mai and mae hong son and pai
if you do the whole loop
thats a lot of turns
if youve got motion sickness, you might want to stop off and get some coffee
by the way if any of you do suffer from road sickness
try taking ginger tablets or drinking ginger tea
it does miracles
i dont suffer from it, but we have a friend that does
and we took her on all these curves and she did not get sick once and normally she is really bad
even with all the burning, its quite an outstanding view
so if youre heading around the mae hong son loop
check out this place its actually a really beautiful place to stop and have a look at the rice fields
and eden is welcome to sit with you
we both ordered ginger shakes
which is a new drink for me
never tried it before
fresh
thats really nice
this is the last stop for us on our roadtrip before we head to mae hong son
about 15km outside of town
going to check into the hotel and then chill out
so see you later
so we hope you had a good time following us around pai and seeing some of the place we done
some of these new discoveries we found
and onto the next place now
mae hong son
if you enjoyed this, hit the like button and comment and well see you next time
